oai_dc:dc.dc:title: WATER-WAVE INTERACTION IN THE SURF ZONE
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Peregrine, D. Howell
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: surf zone
water/wave interaction
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In the surf zone on beaches, there are strong effects which cannot be described by linear equations. This paper describes a number of wave interactions that can take place, using the simplest set of equations that give an adequate qualitative description. The results are of value for comparison with detailed experimental measurements and for gaining understanding of surf zone processes.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 14 (1974): Proceedings of 14th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Copenhagen, Denmark, 1974.; 28
